channel.title: [pi] ::reward
channel.description:
Hello is their like a command u can ::reward which u can only use every 24 hour so basically i want my players to recieve 10m every 24hour, when they use ::reward.
Basically like vote4cash but just a simple timer thing?
And some c.sendmessage(Please wait 24 hour before using reward again And c.sendmessage(Enjoy your 10m ;) thnaks for playing!)

Not much to figure out though.

item.title: [pi] ::reward
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

I’m a total amateur, but it’s something along the lines of:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("cash")) { addItem(995, 2147000000); c.sendmessage(Enjoy your 10m thnaks for playing!)}

Then add a time interval with an exception of saying “Please wait 24 hour before using reward again”, but I’m not 100% sure…

Read full topic
